startUrls.title: Sreality Detail URLs
startUrls.description: List of Sreality.cz detail page URLs to scrape (e.g., https://www.sreality.cz/detail/...)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of detail pages to scrape

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for scraping (recommended for production)

skipScraping.title: Skip Scraping (Test LLM Only)
skipScraping.description: Skip web scraping and only test LLM functionality with sample data

outputMockInconsistencies.title: Output Mock Inconsistency Results
outputMockInconsistencies.description: Generate and output mock inconsistency check results (ConsistencyCheckResult objects) for testing

useLLM.title: Use LLM Analysis
useLLM.description: Enable LLM analysis of scraped property data via OpenRouter (requires APIFY_TOKEN)

llmModel.title: LLM Model
llmModel.description: Model to use for LLM requests (openrouter/auto automatically selects the best model)

llmTemperature.title: LLM Temperature
llmTemperature.description: Temperature for LLM responses (0.0-2.0). Lower = more deterministic, higher = more creative
